## Overview

- `niri-genconfig` â€“ allows using multiple KDL configuration files instead of a single `config.kdl`.
- `niri-workspaces` â€“ creates sessions for different tasks.
- `niri-ipcext` â€“ performs IPC-like modifications.

## Installation

Install with `pipx`, `pip` or `uv` accordingly:

```
pipx install niri-companion
pip install niri-companion
uv tool install niri-companion
```
